review: I've been using Chromecast at home to stream from Netflix and Amazon Prime.  My internet tends to be unreliable in the area I use the device, and I've had some trouble with connectivity.  I purchased a few Chromecast devices for teachers in my school this year and so far it's gotten great reviews.  It's easy to set up and to use.  The teachers love the ability to wirelessly connect to their projectors.  Teachers have been connecting to Chromecast with MacBook Airs and Samsung Chromebooks.  The range is about 10 feet.  I see a lot of promise for students presenting work wirelessly as well.
author: Katie
